The ship may have looked like the one blaze had saw but this one was much 
different and more advanced by far. The ship she may have seen was the 
prototype for the ship since none of the ships from her future has transwarp 
warpgate technology(Im only guessing so dont yell at me if im wrong. ::Hides 
under a rock just in case::)Vile laughed evily as the dozen autoguns fired on 
the Violator, the ship rocked slightly from the dozen or so blasts before the 
ship opened fire again with a total of six Mega cannon blasts, 8 laser 
blasts, 4 photon torpedoes, two Mega missiles. About this time the Vile Can 
had finished charging and the energy around the cannon crackled wildly with 
energy.

Methos: "Vile, the Vile cannon is charged and ready to open fire!"

Vile: "Open fire then!"

And with that said Methos pressed a larged red button and the massive ship 
began to tremble wildly as the large cannon opened fire sending a massive 
beam at the Trainers base, all the fire power heading directly to where the 
firepower hit the last time. As this happened Cyanide flew higher into the 
sky before he unleashed another 3 beams of energized acid at the trainers 
base.

--part1_77.15a00458.284bcb90_boundary
